text: don’t have much critical feedback here - just chiming in to say I really liked this paper. as a casual observer of programming-by-example and program synthesis stuff, I found it super readable and am excited about the vision. especially like the phrase “the programmer must be updated along with the program” as a concise summary of something we tend to overlook if we don’t take an explicitly human-centric approach, and the consideration of how this might impact teams rather than solo programmers alone
